Karen wrote:
> >  FYI the concept of a resource is just an abstraction and trying to
> >  explicitly define what the term resource actually means, therein lies
> >  madness. '-)
> 
> Oh, not at all.  A resource is a thingy.  Perfectly simple.  GET the 
> thingy, PUT the changed thingy, DELETE the thingy, POST a new 
> thingy. The Internet is a series of thingies.

heh. [1]
